roleset.name: cause to cease employment
roleset.note: OUST-V NOTES: extrapolate passives, forms without job from here. (from oust.01-v)

example.name: all args
example.text: [Mr. Ackerman]-1 already is seeking *trace*-1 to oust Mr. Edelman as chairman of Datapoint Corp., an Intelogic affiliate.
example.arg: as chairman of Datapoint Corp., an Intelogic affiliate
